div.p: Calculated weights of the vulnerability indicators

tr.td: Institutional capacity
Proportion of houses with exclusive sanitary facilities
Temperature
Proportion of population 65 years or older
Wind velocity
Proportion of crowded households
Proportion of households with sewage treatment service
Average number of children per household
Proportion of households with garbage collection service
Proportion of households with land phone service
Relative humidity
Illiteracy rate
Proportion of population working agriculture, hunting or fisheries
Proportion of population less than 5 year old
Proportion of households on agriculture owning land
Average time in business
Proportion of households receiving water through piped system
Proportion of population with mobile access
Precipitation
Average business revenues
Proportion of population not under social security coverage
Proportion of population with any permanent disability
Proportion of households living on owned house
Proportion of population with private health insurance
Proportion of households below poverty line
Proportion of households with electricity service
Proportion irrigated land/total agricultural land
Proportion of population affected by disasters
Proportion of population with internet access
Minimum distance to large town
Proportion of households with access to computer
Tax revenues per capita
Net rate high school attendance
Funds for environmental protection per capita
Proportion of households with proper sanitary facilities
Population per non-medical doctor
Employment rate
Population density
Proportion of households where head is female
Number of patients per hospital bed
Proportion of population working in own business
Average energy consumption (Kwh/annum)
